original_text:
“What is mankind that you make so much of them,
    that you give them so much attention,
korean_text: 사람이 무엇이기에 주께서 그를 크게 만드사 그에게 마음을 두시고

sentences.original_text: that you make so much of them
that you give them so much attention
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그들에게 그렇게 많은 관심을 기울이시는
